special_attacks: +1 on attack rolls against goblinoid and orc humanoids, weapon training (axes +1)
other_gear: +1 full plate, masterwork cold iron dwarven waraxe, masterwork light crossbow with 20 bolts, masterwork throwing axe, cloak of resistance +1, 46 gp
ranged: mwk throwing axe +11 (1d6+5) or mwk light crossbow +10 (1d8/19–20)
feats: Blind-Fight, Disruptive, Greater Bull Rush, Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, Step Up, Weapon Focus (dwarven waraxe), Weapon Specialization (dwarven waraxe)

sections.body:
Before Combat The fighter drinks her potion of bull's strength.

During Combat When fighting with a group, the fighter uses bull rush to grant attacks of opportunity to her allies. She uses the combination of Step Up and Disruptive to interrupt spellcasting.

Base Statistics Without bull's strength, the fighter's statistics are

Melee mwk cold iron dwarven waraxe +12/+7 (1d10+6/×3)

Ranged mwk throwing axe +11 (1d6+3)

Str 15

CMB +9 (+13 bull rush)

CMD 21 (27 vs. bull rush, 25 vs. trip)

Skills Climb +8.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Spell hunters specialize in locking down and then murdering enemy spellcasters.

defensive_abilities: bravery +2, defensive training (+4 dodge bonus to AC vs. giants)
name: Spell Hunter
skills: Climb +10, Intimidate +8, Perception +5 (+7 to notice unusual stonework), Survival +10
will: +5; +2 vs. poison, spells, and spell-like abilities; +2 vs. fear
combat_gear: oil of magic weapon (2), potion of aid, potion of bull's strength, potions of cure moderate wounds (2)
